author: Will Knight
title: China Flexes Its Soft Power With ‘Covid Diplomacy’
description: Initially criticized for covering up and failing to control the virus, China is rebranding its response as a symbol of leadership and strength.
content: Sunday, as President Trump sought to deflect criticism for shortages of medical equipment by accusing hospital staff of stealing masks, several aircraft carrying much-needed supplies from China were arriving at airports in Europe and Africa. The Irish governm… [+5174 chars]
